course.title: The Hebrew Bible
course.meeting_text: M., W., (F.), at 10, and a weekly section to be arranged.
course.faculty_text: Shaye J.D. Cohen (Near Eastern Languages and Civilizations)
course.description: This course is a survey of the major books and ideas of the Hebrew Bible (commonly called the Old Testament). The course will also treat the historical contexts in which the Bible emerged, and the Bible's role as canonical scripture in Judaism and Christianity.
course.notes: All readings in translation. No prior knowledge of the subject is assumed. This course fulfills the requirement that one of the eight General Education courses also engage substantially with Study of the Past.
